actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require an independent study and report on simulated tactical flight training in a sustained gravity environment.
short_title: Simulated Tactical Flight Training Study Act of 2012

summary.text: Simulated Tactical Flight Training Study Act of 2012 - Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to provide for an appropriate federally funded research and development center to study the effectiveness of simulated tactical flight training in a sustained gravity environment.

titles.title: Simulated Tactical Flight Training Study Act of 2012
A bill to require an independent study and report on simulated tactical flight training in a sustained gravity environment.
